term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - monomeric unit (monomer unit, mer)
term.title: monomeric unit

item.text: The largest constitutional unit contributed by a single monomer molecule to the structure of a macromolecule or oligomer molecule.

notes.item: The largest constitutional unit contributed by a single monomer molecule to the structure of a macromolecule or oligomer molecule may be described as either monomeric, or by monomer used adjectivally.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2287. 'Glossary of basic terms in polymer science (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2290 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122287)
